page.title: 19RESTAURANTS ETC.-WENT HILLS
page.content: The area provides very good facilities for people requiring meals and accommodation or rooms for meetings, receptions etc. As we could not give a full picture of Darrington, we looked closely at Wentbridge. Wentbridge House has 20 bedrooms, 2 restaurants, one of which may be used for private parties, and the Crystal Suite which can provide conference and banqueting facilities for up to 120 people. The manager thought the setting of the village was a big attraction, as well as the Hotel's position near the A1. The Swiss Cottage is a large restaurant with a Carvery. It is popular for parties from the districts around. We sampled the menu! (Page18) The Blue Bell Inn is the oldest on the A1. It is popular for lunches. There is a cafe and 2 Bed & B.house
